value:
$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|Hm... So this is the Tempest, then...
It seems like something that should
not be left alone. Yet I, too, am alo—$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Empress Sanaki! Are you all right?!$k$pI have no excuse! I am sworn to
protect you and should have never
let you near such danger...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|Sigrun! You are late... If something
were to have happened to me, what
would you have done?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|I beg your forgiveness, Empress.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|I suppose there was no harm done.
Besides, it was I who decided to leave
for the festival on my own.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|Is that Tempest to blame? If so...
Empress Sanaki, Commander, both
of you please wait here.$k$pI will annihilate the enemy.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|Hm... I will be going as well.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|Please—not this again. All I ask is that
you sit still, and yet you seem unable,
or unWILLING, to do that...$k$p*sigh* I suppose it is better than just
letting you wander around...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Tanith... You aren't speaking to your
subordinates right now.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|...Right! As you say! My most
sincere apologies to you both!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|W-well then, lead the way, Empress
Sanaki. Your Holy Guard will ensure
no harm comes to you!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|Good!$k$p

$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|That strange vortex seems to be
finally disappearing.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Empress Sanaki, you performed
wonderfully. Well done.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|You may have tripped on your
dress several times, but...overall,
very well done.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|Was there ever any doubt? Now, all
that's left is to return, but...$k$pWell, since I have the chance, there
is something I would like to say to the
two of you.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Yes...Empress?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|For always being at my side...even
when it is difficult...thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Please, Empress, such kindness is
wasted on us.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|No, I disagree... Kind words alone are
not enough. I...do not keep you near
because you are my retainers.$k$pQuite the opposite, in fact... Because
you see... It is difficult for me to put it
into words for some reason, but...$k$pWhen it comes to the two of you...
You are...important to me.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Well... I love you too, Empress Sanaki.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|...But why so suddenly? Did the
chaos of the Tempest addle your
mind, Empress?!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Wedding18,Face|O-of course not! How insolent! I felt
this way long before we got here...$k$pForget I said anything... Now, Sigrun!
Tanith! Let's all return home.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シグルーン,ch09_11_Sigurun_F_Wedding19,Face|Yes, Empress. Let's go home.$k$p
